named-query.name: File.findByHash
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM PhysicalFile f WHERE f.contentHash = :hash

named-query.name: File.isOrphan
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(f) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM File f WHERE f.physicalFile = :physicalFile

named-query.name: User.findByUid
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.uid = :uid

named-query.name: User.findSubordinateUsers
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserClosure uc JOIN uc.descendant u WHERE uc.antecessor.id = :id AND uc.pathLength > 0

named-query.name: User.isSubordinateUser
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(u) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM UserClosure uc JOIN uc.descendant u WHERE uc.antecessor.id = :managerId AND u.id= :subordinateId

named-query.name: UserClosure.findAntecessorsUserClosuresById
named-query.query: SELECT uc FROM UserClosure uc WHERE uc.descendant.id = :id

named-query.name: UserClosure.findDescendantsUserClosuresById
named-query.query: SELECT uc FROM UserClosure uc WHERE uc.antecessor.id = :id
